meanings.sent1: The mustereds toys were neatly arranged on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The team mustered all their strength for the game.
meanings.sent3: The mustereds group of friends had a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The mustereds clouds gathered ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The mustereds crowd cheered loudly at the concert.

meanings.definition: Summoned or gathered for inspection or service
meanings.sent1: The general mustered his troops before battle.
meanings.sent2: The teacher mustered the students for the field trip.
meanings.sent3: The cat mustered the courage to approach the dog.
meanings.sent4: She mustered all her resources to complete the project.
meanings.sent5: The captain mustered the crew for the voyage.

meanings.sent1: He mustered the strength to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent2: She mustered the courage to speak in front of the class.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mustered the energy to gather more nuts.
meanings.sent4: They mustered the determination to finish the race.
meanings.sent5: The child mustered the bravery to face the dark closet.
